name: Senior Statistical Programmer
description:
Responsibilities:

As Senior Statistical Programmer you will support various SAS® programming activities related to the analysis and reporting of clinical study data; you will use programming techniques to produce analysis datasets, tables, figures and data listings ensuring first-time quality, traceability and regulatory compliance.

Development opportunities

In our company there are several opportunities for future development for a Statistical Programmer:

• Lead projects of varying complexity

• Develop statistical knowledge using and different SAS® procedures, e.g.: proc lifetest, proc phreg

• Participate in preparation of electronic submission packages according to the industry standards.

• Support response to regulatory agency questions.

• Prepare input to publications and conference materials.

• Become an expert in different areas and share your knowledge

Our Key Benefits:

You will be part of our highly qualified and dynamic team!

Smooth induction and training program.

Flexible working hours and a friendly and supportive working atmosphere. We cooperate within projects, help each other and achieve results as a one team. (We even compete in ping-pong, football and board games!)

Benefit package that includes:

  • Private medical care for employee and 1 family member
  • Plus 3 extra days for vacation per year
  • Opportunity to take part in industry conferences
  • Life assurance
  • English classes
  • Opportunity to work from home

Your profile

  • Experience in our industry
  • Programming or data analytic experience
  • Knowledge of SAS®
  • Understanding the principles of statistics.
  • BSc/MSc/PhD degree in statistics, econometrics, mathematics, informatics or a related field or equivalent professional experience.

Why Work for Parexel?

Parexel International is a multinational, life sciences consulting firm and contract research organization (CRO). It conducts clinical trials on behalf of its pharmaceutical clients to expedite the drug approval process. It is the second largest clinical research organization in the world and has helped develop approximately 95% of the 200 top-selling biopharmaceuticals on the market today

By working at Parexel you can have meaningful impact for patients worldwide.
